title: Critical bug in ownCloud file sharing app exposes admin passwords
description: Open source file sharing software ownCloud is warning of three critical-severity security vulnerabilities, including one that can expose administrator passwords and mail server credentials. [...]

title: UK and South Korea: Hackers use zero-day in supply-chain attack

title: Cyberattack on IT provider CTS impacts dozens of UK law firms
description: A cyberattack on CTS, a leading managed service provider (MSP) for law firms and other organizations in the UK legal sector, is behind a major outage impacting numerous law firms and home buyers in the country since Wednesday. [...]
